mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHDL (SCHDL_NUM, SCHDL_TYPE_NUM, SCHDL_CTGRY_NUM,EMP_NUM, USER_CTGRY_NAME, SCHDL_TITLE, SCHDL_PLACE, SCHDL_CONT, SCHDL_START_TIME, SCHDL_END_TIME, ALDY_DVSN) VALUES (SCHDL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{schdl_type}, #{schdl_ctgry}, #{emp_num}, '0', #{schdl_title}, #{schdl_place}, #{schdl_cont}, #{schdl_start_time}, #{schdl_end_time}, #{aldy_dvsn})
